column4: hi guys. I was wondering if anyone has been using a WD passport essential under ubuntu and if it's running fine? Official info only says compatible MS/Apple. I assume it's fine, but I would like to be sure before buying it
I think that's the kind of portable hardrive I have, and it works fine for me in ubuntu
well, it's a wd passport, I think it is a model older than the essential, should probably still work though
